document_data.name: agitate metal
document_data.mainbody: '''''Agitate metal''''' was an [[utterance]] from the Lexicon of the Crafted Tool that used [[truespeak]] to violently shift the temperature of a given item.
document_data.Usage: The utterance functioned similarly to the spells ''[[heat metal]]'' or ''[[chill metal]]'', but its chilled form generated a blue glow around the object.
